title: Acas early conciliation certificate (optional)
p1: You should check the Acas certificate number and date, or whether the claimant was correct to say they were exempt from early conciliation.
link: View Acas certificate (opens in new tab)

et3ResponseAcasAgree.label: Do you agree with the details given by the claimant about early conciliation with Acas?

et3ResponseAcasAgreeReason.label: Why do you disagree with the Acas conciliation details given? (optional)

et3ResponseAcasAgreeReason.tooLong: The details of why you disagree must be less than 800 characters
